verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We lift our hands to you in praise
Your mercy lifts up, your words renew our strength
We lift our hearts to you in thanks
Its only by your grace and power we stand.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hosanna, Hosanna, Hosanna
Hosanna to the king.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yo alzo mis manos en alabanza.
Tu misericordia me levanta y me esfuerza.
Yo alzo mi corazón en gratitud.
Sólo por tu gracia y poder estoy aquí.
Hosanna, hosanna, hosanna,
Hosanna al Rey.
